{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import ohmlr\n",
    "from sklearn.datasets import load_digits\n",
    "import numpy as np"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "digits = load_digits()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "(0, 9)"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 8,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x = digits.data.astype(int)\n",
    "y = digits.target.astype(int)\n",
    "y.min(), y.max()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "shuffle = np.random.permutation(range(x.shape[0]))\n",
    "x = x[shuffle]\n",
    "y = y[shuffle]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "(0.9593400117855039, 0.68)"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 10,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x_classes = np.arange(x.min(), x.max()+1)\n",
    "y_classes = np.arange(y.min(), y.max()+1)\n",
    "model = ohmlr.ohmlr.ohmlr(x_classes=x_classes, y_classes=y_classes)\n",
    "split = 100\n",
    "model.fit(x[:-split], y[:-split])\n",
    "model.score(x[:-split], y[:-split]), model.score(x[-split:], y[-split:])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": []
  }
 ],
